name: Dervish of Dawn
text: You are among a small number of avengers who seek enlightenment through the study of desert dervish traditions. In the tireless turns of the dervish dance, the cares and distractions of the mortal world fall away, allowing you to perceive divine truths.

features.celerityOfMorning(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you can also make a saving throw with a bonus equal to your Wisdom modifier
features.radiantBlessing(11thLevel): When you use an encounter or a daily attack power that has the radiant keyword, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn
features.dervishEcstasy(16thLevel): If you are bloodied during an encounter, you can use a second Channel Divinity power in that encounter

flavorText: In the turnings of the dance, the divine purpose is made clear.
